tags.name: Volunteer
tags.description: Individuals who have signed up for volunteering activities

tags.name: Choir Member
tags.description: Members of the church choir group

tags.name: New Member
tags.description: Individuals who recently joined the community

tags.name: Youth Group
tags.description: Young members of the congregation typically between ages 13-18

tags.name: Sunday School Teacher
tags.description: Contacts who are responsible for teaching Sunday school classes

tags.name: Regular Giver
tags.description: Contacts who regularly contribute financially to the church

tags.name: Prayer Team
tags.description: A group of individuals committed to regular prayer for the church and its members

tags.name: Event Coordinator
tags.description: Responsible for planning and executing church events

tags.name: Greeter
tags.description: Volunteers who welcome people into the church and provide assistance

tags.name: Bible Study Participant
tags.description: Members who regularly attend bible study sessions

tags.name: Mission Trip Donor
tags.description: Individuals who have donated to support mission trips

tags.name: Worship Team
tags.description: Members who are part of the team that leads worship during services

tags.name: Bible Study Leader
tags.description: Contacts who lead and facilitate bible study groups within the church.

tags.name: Hospitality Team
tags.description: A group of individuals who manage hospitality for church events and services.

tags.name: Outreach Volunteer
tags.description: Members who volunteer for outreach programs aimed at community service and evangelism.

tags.description: Members who regularly attend bible study sessions

tags.name: Mission Trip Donor
tags.description: Individuals who have donated to support mission trips

tags.name: Worship Team
tags.description: Members who are part of the team that leads worship during services

tags.name: Outreach Volunteer
tags.description: Individuals who participate in community outreach and charitable work on behalf of the church

tags.name: Baptism Candidate
tags.description: Persons who have expressed their desire for baptism and are undergoing preparation

tags.name: Fundraising Committee
tags.description: Group responsible for organizing fundraising initiatives for church-related projects

tags.name: Elder
tags.description: Respected individuals who provide wisdom and guidance within church leadership

tags.name: Service Volunteer
tags.description: Individuals who dedicate their time to help during various church services

tags.name: Children's Ministry
tags.description: Volunteers or staff who work with the children's education and activity programs within the church

tags.name: Outreach Volunteer
tags.description: Individuals who participate in outreach activities organized by the church to foster community relations and assist the less fortunate.

tags.name: Fundraising Committee
tags.description: A group of members tasked with organizing fundraising events to support church projects and outreach programs.

tags.name: Audio/Visual Team
tags.description: Technical team responsible for managing the sound and visual systems during church services and events.

tags.name: Long-term Member
tags.description: Individuals who have been part of the church community for an extended period

tags.name: Outreach Volunteer
tags.description: Members who engage in outreach programs to help the community

tags.name: Bible Study Leader
tags.description: A person who leads bible study groups within the church

tags.name: Board Member
tags.description: Elected individuals who make important decisions about church governance
